message.name: INF_EMAIL_ERROR_CONNECTING_TO_SERVER_WITH_MSG
message.locale: Error connecting to server, with message '%1s'

message.name: INF_READING_FROM_ADDRESS
message.locale: Error reading 'from' address, using default error email

message.name: ERR_INPUT_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Missing date field in input file.

message.name: INF_ERROR_READING_USERNAME
message.locale: Error reading username, using default error email.

message.name: INF_ERROR_READING_DEFAULT_ADDRESS
message.locale: Error reading default error email address.

message.name: INF_USERNAME_EMAIL_ADDRESS_EMPTY
message.locale: No email address exists for specified user.

message.name: INF_USERNAME_EMAIL_ADDRESS_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Email address record not found for specified user.

message.name: INF_USER_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No user record exists for specified user.

message.name: INF_NO_LOGGING_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Runtime logging was not switched on for this batch job.
